If there are no available chats, you can set your own availability in your profile.

You will then be notified when a suitable chat becomes available.

intro.title: You're in! Here's how it works
intro.description: Follow the simple steps below to start chatting with others

step1.title: Step 1.
step1.content: Highlight your availability in the calendar on your profile.

step2.title: Step 2.
step2.content:
Others will then be able to see your available times and request a chat with you.

You will be notified via email when a request is made.

step3.title: Step 3.
step3.content: Confirm the chat if the time and date still works for you.

step4.title: Step 4.
step4.content:
Have a great conversation at the specified time and date!

To access the chat you just need to click on the special link provided. Easy!
